amendment.description: To modify the wage requirements for employers seeking to hire H-2A and blue card agricultural workers.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4009 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 43. Record Vote Number: 136.

Amendment SA 4009 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S4788-4789; text: CR S4788-4789) To modify the wage requirements for employers seeking to hire H-2A and blue card agricultural workers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4009 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 43. Record Vote Number: 136.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4009 proposed by Senator Chambliss.
